speaker: Agent
text: Good afternoon, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m doing alright, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding your account with City Bank. Can you please verify your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Can you also confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I see you have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next month.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds like a good plan. I can process the $100 payment right now. Would you like to use your credit card?

speaker: Agent
text: Please provide your card number when you’re ready.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. I will process that now. You will receive a confirmation shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: Great, thank you for your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You’re welcome! Have a great day.
